Salt_Lake_City.This Is the Place Heritage Park:
The This is the Place Heritage Park is located on the east side of Salt Lake City, Utah, United States at the foot of the Wasatch Range and near the mouth of Emigration Canyon.


== History ==
The location of the park is where, on July 24, 1847, Brigham Young first saw the Salt Lake Valley that would soon become the Mormon pioneers' new home. Members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints believe that Young had a vision shortly after they were exiled from Nauvoo, Illinois.
